reviews.Review: No discipline in staff, zero facility, stink bathroom, no proper seats, no inhouse ultra sound facility. Will have to stand outside for their turn. Atleast get some basic facility in clinic. Even the ramp is half broken at the enterance. 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻

address: Kunjpura Road, Model Town, Near State Bank Of India, Sector 12, Saini Colony, Slum Area, Sector 12, Karnal, Haryana 132001, India
